BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Education

Items.Title: Oversight - Recycling in our schools: Are we setting the right example?
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Recycling in our schools: Are we setting the right example?

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Education
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to school recycling.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution urging the Department of Education and the Department of Sanitation to immediately implement school recycling programs in all New York City public and private schools.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: DOE and the Dept of Sanitation to immediately implement school recycling programs in all NYC public and private schools.

Items.Title: Oversight - Recycling in our schools: Are we setting the right example?
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Recycling in our schools: Are we setting the right example?

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to school recycling.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution urging the Department of Education and the Department of Sanitation to immediately implement school recycling programs in all New York City public and private schools.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: DOE and the Dept of Sanitation to immediately implement school recycling programs in all NYC public and private schools.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Recchia, Vacca, Koppell, Liu, Garodnick, Ignizio and de Blasio
